#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int test,n,x;
	vector<int> vec;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&x);
			vec.push_back(x);
		}
		sort(vec.begin(),vec.end());
		int val=vec[0],counter=1,ans=0,len=n;
		for(int i=1;i<len;i++)
		{
			if(vec[i]==val)
			{
				counter++;
			}
			else
			{
				if(counter>1)
					ans++;
				counter=1;				
				val=vec[i];
			}
		}
		if(counter>1)
			ans++;
		printf("%d\n",ans);
		vec.clear();


	}
	return 0;
}
